sections.heading: 01|Age of majority.Effective:January 1, 1974Latest Legislation:Senate Bill 1 - 110th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAll persons of the age of eighteen years or more, who are under no legal disability, are capable of contracting and are of full age for all purposes
